languages.text: "То дело на Даргонусе напомнило мне расследования на одном каликсийском мире-улье, Благочестии. Не сказать, чтобы я по ним скучал, однако идти по следу преступника — приятное занятие..."
languages.translation_comment: Completed Abelard's second quest. Regina was exposed and executed either alone or along with the rest of the Sauerbacks.

traits.locale_text: "Это дело напомнило мне расследования в порте Странник. Не сказать, чтобы я по ним скучал, однако идти по следу преступника — приятное занятие..."

languages.text: "The case on Dargonus brought back memories from my investigating days on a certain Calixian hive world, Piety. I can't say I miss those times, but there is something pleasurable about following the criminal's trail..."
languages.translation_comment: Completed Abelard's second quest. Regina was exposed and executed either alone or along with the rest of the Sauerbacks.

"The case on Dargonus brought back memories from my investigating days on a certain Calixian hive world, Piety. I can't say I miss those times, but there is something pleasurable about following the criminal's trail..."

languages.text: 「ダルゴナスでの事件は、かつて俺がキャリクシス・エクスパンスの過密惑星、パイエティで捜査官をしていた頃の記憶を呼び起こした。あの頃が懐かしいとは言えないが…犯罪者の痕跡を追うという行為には、どこか快感めいたものがある」
languages.original_text: "The case on Dargonus brought back memories from my investigating days on a certain Calixian hive world, Piety. I can't say I miss those times, but there is something pleasurable about following the criminal's trail..."

traits.locale_text: 「ダルゴナスでの事件は、かつて俺がキャリクシス・エクスパンスの過密惑星、パイエティで捜査官をしていた頃の記憶を呼び起こした。あの頃が懐かしいとは言えないが…犯罪者の痕跡を追うという行為には、どこか快感めいたものがある」

languages.text: "Der Fall auf Dargonus hat Erinnerungen daran geweckt, wie ich auf einer calixischen Makropolwelt namens Piety ermittelt habe. Ich vermisse diese Zeiten nicht unbedingt, aber es hat doch etwas Befriedigendes, Verbrecher zu jagen ..."
languages.original_text: "The case on Dargonus brought back memories from my investigating days on a certain Calixian hive world, Piety. I can't say I miss those times, but there is something pleasurable about following the criminal's trail..."

traits.locale_text: "Der Fall auf Dargonus hat Erinnerungen daran geweckt, wie ich auf einer calixischen Makropolwelt namens Piety ermittelt habe. Ich vermisse diese Zeiten nicht unbedingt, aber es hat doch etwas Befriedigendes, Verbrecher zu jagen ..."

languages.text: « L'affaire de Dargonus m'a rappelé l'époque où je travaillais comme enquêteur sur Piété, un monde ruche de Calixis. Même si je préfère mon poste actuel, j'ai toujours pris du plaisir à traquer des criminels... »
languages.original_text: "The case on Dargonus brought back memories from my investigating days on a certain Calixian hive world, Piety. I can't say I miss those times, but there is something pleasurable about following the criminal's trail..."

traits.locale_text: « L'affaire de Dargonus m'a rappelé l'époque où je travaillais comme enquêteur sur Piété, un monde ruche de Calixis. Même si je préfère mon poste actuel, j'ai toujours pris du plaisir à traquer des criminels... »

languages.text: «El caso de Dargonus me recuerda la temporada que pasé investigando en Piedad, un mundo colmena del sector Calixis. No puedo decir que lo eche de menos, pero hay algo placentero en seguir el rastro de un criminal...».
languages.original_text: "The case on Dargonus brought back memories from my investigating days on a certain Calixian hive world, Piety. I can't say I miss those times, but there is something pleasurable about following the criminal's trail..."

traits.locale_text: «El caso de Dargonus me recuerda la temporada que pasé investigando en Piedad, un mundo colmena del sector Calixis. No puedo decir que lo eche de menos, pero hay algo placentero en seguir el rastro de un criminal...».

languages.text: “达戈努斯的这个案子，让我想起了在卡利西斯的巢都世界虔信之都当调查官的那段日子。虽然我不怎么怀念那段时光，但不得不说，追查罪犯的踪迹确实是件令人愉悦的事情……”
languages.original_text: "The case on Dargonus brought back memories from my investigating days on a certain Calixian hive world, Piety. I can't say I miss those times, but there is something pleasurable about following the criminal's trail..."

traits.locale_text: “达戈努斯的这个案子，让我想起了在卡利西斯的巢都世界虔信之都当调查官的那段日子。虽然我不怎么怀念那段时光，但不得不说，追查罪犯的踪迹确实是件令人愉悦的事情……”

languages.text: "Dargonus vakası, beni Takva diye bir Calixis kovan dünyasındaki sorgu günlerime götürdü. O günleri aramıyorum ama suçluların izini sürmenin tatmin edici bir yanı var."
languages.original_text: "The case on Dargonus brought back memories from my investigating days on a certain Calixian hive world, Piety. I can't say I miss those times, but there is something pleasurable about following the criminal's trail..."

traits.locale_text: "Dargonus vakası, beni Piety diye bir Calixis kovan dünyasındaki sorgu günlerime götürdü. O günleri aramıyorum ama suçluların izini sürmenin tatmin edici bir yanı var."

languages.original_text: "The case on Dargonus brought back memories from my investigating days on a certain Calixian hive world, Piety. I can't say I miss those times, but there is something pleasurable about following the criminal's trail..."
